## RouterOptions.stringifyQuery property

Custom implementation to stringify a query object. Should not prepend a leading `?`<!-- -->. [parseQuery](./reactivuety.routeroptions.parsequery.md) counterpart to handle query parsing.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stringifyQuery?: typeof originalStringifyQuery;
```
